title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-hosted LLM runner with a simple CLI and REST API that lets you pull, run and chat with open-source models like Llama-2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. on macOS, Linux & Windows.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client & asyncio bindings for the Ollama API; installable via PyPI.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; published on npm with both ESM and CommonJS builds.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that adds Ollama as a local LLM provider for chains, agents, retrieval, tool-calling, etc.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, RAG, voice input, plugins).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API, streaming support and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem providing idiomatic client for Ollama API with streaming support.

title: ollama-cli (maccoyl/ollama-cli)
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with chat history, prompt templates and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions and chat.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) and compose examples for running Ollama in Docker.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Template repo showing how to build RAG pipelines with Ollama, LangChain & Chroma locally.

title: ollama-functions
summary: Experimental project demonstrating function-calling / tool-use pattern with Ollama models.

title: ollama-chatbot (vercel example)
summary: Next.js chatbot example from Vercel that streams responses from a local Ollama server.

title: ollama-gui (tkashkin/ollama-gui)
summary: Lightweight cross-platform GUI for Ollama built with Flutter; supports chat and model management.

title: ollama-npm (npm search)
summary: Curated npm search page listing 30+ community packages: clients, CLI helpers, LangChain adapters, etc.

title: ollama-pypi (PyPI search)
summary: PyPI search showing official and community Python libraries integrating Ollama with FastAPI, Django, RAG stacks.

title: Ollama Reddit community
summary: Active subreddit for sharing models, troubleshooting, integrations and ecosystem announcements.

title: Ollama Discord server
summary: Official Discord with channels for model-requests, api-help, show-and-tell, and plugin dev.

title: awesome-ollama
summary: Community-curated Awesome list: tools, libraries, tutorials, model Modelfiles, and use-cases for Ollama.
